name: Heroes vs Aliens: Defenders of Light
name_original: Heroes vs Aliens: Defenders of Light
description:
In the year 30XX, on a distant lush extraterrestrial planet filled with strange plants, the new Hero City is under attack by a menacing alien force! Call upon mighty heroes and superheroes to defend Hero City against the alien threat. Use advanced technology and superpowers to protect humanity.

The aliens come with a variety of deadly weapons, versatile mutations, zombie-like resurrection capabilties, and advanced equipment. Mutant strength, monstrous speed, powerful weapons, and unlimited fighting spirit! They will stop at nothing to defeat our heroes and take over Hero City!

Summon the might of our defenders! Use high tech power plants to increase our energy reserves and deploy our soldiers, defenders, engineers, and medics on to the field! Power them up with new generation power armor and enhanced special weapons!

Will our heroes be able to fend off the threat of alien invasion???

Features:
- Hand-Drawn 2D graphics!
- PvZ Style Tower Defense!
- Epic Superheroes!
- Simple but Challenging!
- Amazing sound effects and music
